scenes.action_text: DECEPTION Written by Mark Bomback & Patrick Marber September 15th, 2005 I . EXTREME CLOSE ON A CELL PHONE resting face up on a black surface. A beat of silence -- is broken by its abrupt RING... RING... RING... Move in tighter on the phone's LCD DISPLAY. A number comes up: 555-3827 RING... RING... RING... A hand enters frame. We follow it to a pad and pen we now disc
